metadata.title: CVE-2022-31606 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where a failure to properly validate data might allow an attacker with basic user capabilities to cause an out-of-bounds access in kernel mode, which could lead to denial of service, information disclosure, escalation of privileges, or data tampering.

notes.note: sbeattie> windows drivers only mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here
